title: Land with House for Sale in Colombo - 05
details:
Highly Residential Property in Colombo - 05 (Pipe Road)

Located in calm and quiet, decent residential area

80 feet more road frontage

200 mtrs to High Level Road
100 mtrs to Park Road

25 years old solid house consisting 4 Bed Rooms and attached Bath Rooms, Dining room, Living area, 5 Car Parking
Land with a house (value is for the land only)

Square Block - 21 Perch at 12 Million per Perch (Negotiable)
Total Price Rs. 252 Million (negotiable)

Please call for more information

Exclusively sold by -

PAN GLOBAL PROPERTY DEVELOPERS (PVT) LTD

COLOMBO 03
